none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 15, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
Nasty and honest Middle America hardcore punk with an unmistakable Tele Twang and a punchy rhythm section. This is the shit of garages, of rented halls, of determination. This is the shit of the effort justifying the result...not the other way around. This was the end, but there is more where this came from. PRISONERS
https://lifelikehc.bandcamp.com/album/demo-2013

seo.title: Life Like - Prisoners EP - Terminal Escape
